origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_historical_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves historical data for a cryptocurrency based on its name and a specific date.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency.'}, {'name': 'date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The date in YYYY-MM-DD format for which historical data is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'historicalData', 'description': 'Historical data for the cryptocurrency on the specified date.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_historical_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Chainlink', 'date'是'2026-07-01'.
